author.bio: Web application security and accessibility evangelist. Software instructor. Conference lecturer and presenter.

wordpressPost.title: Vulnerable WordPress Plugins Report for the Week of March 22, 2019
wordpressPost.excerpt: Vulnerable Plugins There are eleven items on the list this week, with three unfixed. The most critical this week are the Unauthenticated Arbitrary wp_options import vulnerability in Easy WP SMTP,...
wordpressPost.content:
Vulnerable Plugins

There are eleven items on the list this week, with three unfixed. The most critical this week are the Unauthenticated Arbitrary wp_options import vulnerability in Easy WP SMTP, and the Unauthenticated SQL Injection vulnerability in Better Search both of which have been fixed in their most recent updates.

View this week’s vulnerable plugins list.
